tool_description: Time converter API is here to help you to convert any time from any timezone to any other timezones time
name: Time Converter
title: Time Converter

api_list.name: Convert Time
api_list.description: This endpoint can convert input time and to any output timezone's time

api_list.name: Get List of timezones
api_list.description: Get List of all global timezones
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://time-converter1.p.rapidapi.com/timezones/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "time-converter1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://time-converter1.p.rapidapi.com/timezones/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "time-converter1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
